授業目的: Please see Class Purpose immediately below:
到達目標: Please see Learning Goals immediately below:
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
関連科目: Students can learn all of the material with no prior background in finance, accounting, or Excel.
授業の概要・背景: The course will cover, among other topics, start-up and young businesses and their critical finance decisions, risk and return, valuation, time value of money, net present value, current issues and trends in finance, and finance and capital markets career opportunities.
授業方法: Students drive the class. Hands-on practice (on paper/Excel spreadsheets), class discussions, readings, case study, videos, podcasts, real-life examples, Power Point slides, and student presentations

第1回:
Face to face format for all 14 lectures
Class Introduction
Compounding
第3回:
Compounding and TVM Review
Equities and Fixed Income
第4回: Group Work to Review Compounding, TVM, Equities and Fixed Income
第5回: Using Online Resources to Find Finance Data
第10回: Everything You Need to Know About Finance and Investing in Two Sessions (Interactive Exercise)
第11回: Everything You Need to Know About Finance and Investing in Two Sessions (Interactive Exercise)

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading3: Student participation and overall engagement with class; student presentations

name: 【330】Special Topics in Economics and Business Administration【Contemporary Finance】　１／Special Topics in Economics and Business Administration [EN]
